AX110003R |series = ROG Rapture |type = wireless router |sernum = 90IG04H0-MO3G00 |fcc_id = MSQ-RTHR00 |icid = 3568A-RTHR00 |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4908; |cpu1_cores = 4 |ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;; |exp_if_types = USB 3.1 (Gen 1) |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.42 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, VHT160, DFS, AiMesh, WTFast, TWT, Link Aggregation, AiProtection |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_XX_2G,ASUS_XX_5G |default_ch = |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9118BAX |manuf_rev = 444-ASU |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = = |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = 4804 |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = |wi3_if_name = |rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684; |rad3oui = |rad3_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam3 = 4804 |rad3ax = 2402 |acqam3 = |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 450 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5 |rad3correv = |rad3cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *''AX11000 Tri-band WiFi Gaming Router'' :10 Gigabit Wi-Fi router with Quad-Core processor :2.5GbE gaming port, DFS band, WTFast, Adaptive QoS, AiMesh :for Mesh WiFi system and AiProtection network security 2.5Gbps port can reportedly be configured for WAN or LAN. {{See also|ASUS GT-AX6000|ASUS RT-AX95U|Huawei AP7060DN}} *The "1.8 GHz quad-core" specs on the ASUS product page suggests that this device uses a [[Broadcom]] CPU like the BCM4908 along with three BCM43684 radios. ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-rog-rapture-gt-ax11000-review ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AX11000 review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/8948/asus-rog-rapture-ax11000-wi-fi-6-router-review/index.html ''ASUS ROG Rapture AX11000 Wi-Fi 6 Router Review'' on '''Tweaktown'''] ===News=== *[https://www.asus.com/us/News/rU7DdBAsBXMQ5cn0 ''ASUS Announces a Complete Lineup of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''ASUS'''] :"A new Turbo Key conveniently located on the outside of the chassis allows you to toggle various functions like Zero Wait DFS on or off without using the web GUI or App interface." *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/12871/asus-announces-a-complete-lineup-of-80211ax-routers ''ASUS Announces a Complete Lineup of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-expands-11ax-lineup-and-sets-ship-date.47010/ ''ASUS Expands 11ax Lineup And Sets Ship Date'' on '''SNB''' forums] ==Notes== *'''Triple-level Game Acceleration''' - Accelerate game traffic :every step of the way - from device to game server. *'''Battle-ready-hardware''' - 1.8 GHz quad-core CPU and 2.5GbE :(2.5GBase-T) port for ultimate performance. *'''Front-line Network Security''' - Neutralize internet threats :before they hit your network. *'''Better Partner with Mesh System''' - Compatible with ASUS :AiMesh Wi-Fi system for seamless whole-home coverage. {{SCollapse2|[https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin.ng/blob/master/release/src-rt/target.mak target.mak] • >> |
export GT-AX11000 := $(HND-94908_BASE)
export GT-AX11000 += BUILD_NAME="GT-AX11000" EXT_PHY="BCM84880" SWITCH2="" NVSIZE="128" DHDAP=y DPSTA=y WTFAST=y \
 REPEATER=y ARM=y AUTODICT=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y LACP=y \
 PRINTER=y WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y USB="USB" APP="network" PROXYSTA=y DNSMQ=y SHP=n BCMWL6=y BCMWL6A=y IPV6SUPP=y \
 DISK_MONITOR=y BTN_WIFITOG=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y LED_BTN=n BCMSMP=y XHCI=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y ROG=y HTTPS=y \
 OPENVPN=y TIMEMACHINE=y MDNS=y VPNC=y BRCM_NAND_JFFS2=y JFFS2LOG=y BWDPI=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=n LINUX_MTD=64 DEBUGFS=y \
 TEMPROOTFS=n SSH=y EMAIL=y FRS_FEEDBACK=n SYSSTATE=y STAINFO=y CLOUDCHECK=n NATNL_AICLOUD=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y \
 MULTICASTIPTV=y QUAGGA=y WLCLMLOAD=n BCM_MUMIMO=y LAN50="all" ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y CFEZ=y ETLAN_LED=y TFAT=y \
 NTFS=tuxera HFS=tuxera NEWSSID_REV2=y NEW_APP_ARM=y VISUALIZATION=y BONDING=y BONDING_WAN=y NETOOL=y DUALWAN=y \
 TRACEROUTE=y FORCE_AUTO_UPGRADE=n ALEXA=y IFTTT=y SW_HW_AUTH=y HD_SPINDOWN=y ASPMD=n BCM_MEVENT=n BCMEVENTD=n \
 BCM_APPEVENTD=n LETSENCRYPT=y VPN_FUSION=n JFFS_NVRAM=y NVRAM_ENCRYPT=y NATNL_AIHOME=y BTN_TURBO=y LOGO_LED=y \
 BCM_CEVENTD=y UTF8_SSID=y RGBLED=y AURASYNC=y I2CTOOLS=y AMAS=y DBLOG=y ETHOBD=y CONNDIAG=y WIREGUARD=y ASD=y \
 IPSEC=STRONGSWAN IPSEC_SRVCLI_ONLY=SRV DWB=y GAME_PROFILE=y ROG_UI=n AMASDB=n CRASHLOG=y WATCH_REINIT=n BW160M=y \
 BRCM_HOSTAPD=y UUPLUGIN=y IPERF3=y INFO_EXAP=y OPEN_NAT=y AHS=n FRS_LIVE_UPDATE=n CAPTCHA=y SW_CTRL_ALLLED=y \
 GAME_MODE=y CFGSYNC_LOCSYNC=y INSTANT_GUARD=y AMAS_ETHDETECT=y ACL96=y GOOGLE_ASST=y EXTEND_LIMIT=y ASUSCTRL=y \
 IPV6S46=y COMFW=y CALC_NVRAM=y \
 NFS=y SNMPD=n TOR=y UPNPIGD2=n NANO=y NTPD=y
}} ==See also== *RMerlin 3rd party firmware is now supported on the ASUS GT-AX11000: [https://www.asuswrt-merlin.net/about RMerlin Firmware] [[Category:English Documentation]]
